section:
D:/gitworkspace/lua/lmathlib.c 文件参考 D:/gitworkspace/lua/lmathlib.c #include "lprefix.h" #include <float.h> #include <limits.h> #include <math.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <time.h> #include "lua.h" #include "lauxlib.h" #include "lualib.h" lmathlib.c 的引用(Include)关系图:
此图展示该文件直接或间接的被哪些文件引用了:
结构体
struct Rand64
struct RanState
宏定义
#define lmathlib_c
#define LUA_LIB
#define PI (l_mathop(3.141592653589793238462643383279502884))
#define FIGS l_floatatt(MANT_DIG)
#define trim32(x) ((x) & 0xffffffffu)
#define UONE ((lu_int32)1)
#define scaleFIG (l_mathop(0.5) / (UONE << (FIGS - 1)))
类型定义
typedef unsigned long lu_int32
typedef struct Rand64 Rand64
